channel.title: [Need Hoster] Need A Good Hoster Around 24/7 Or More!
channel.description:
Hey, Myself Anonymous here.
After loads of requests from my members for us becoming 24/7 i thought i would ask around abit. So the 1st place i thought i'd ask if here. So, is anyone here willing to run a server maybe not 24/7 but at least around 24/5.
For me details you could come online and check it out, or you could check out the website - BloodThirst.TK, And The Server Ip - Bloodthirst.no-ip.org, Dont try to crash it ill just ip bann you and add you to my big list in peer guardian.
Thanks!
